about_the_game:
Welcome to Phantom Patrol - The Ultimate Paranormal Investigation Experience!

Are you ready to step into the world of the supernatural? Brace yourself for the spine-tingling, heart-pounding adventure that is Phantom Patrol, the ultimate 1-4 player cooperative VR (and flat-screen) game that will test your memory, teamwork, and nerves of steel. As paranormal investigators, it's your mission to unravel the mysteries of a haunted house before malevolent phantoms take over and plunge you into the abyss of terror.

This DEMO features the entire game functionality. If you

Features:

  • 👻 Multiplayer Madness: Team up with friends or brave the horrors alone in solo mode. Phantom Patrol supports 1-4 players, ensuring a chilling experience no matter the size of your paranormal posse.

  • 🏡 Symmetric Exploration: The haunted house has multiple rooms, with a sinister surprise lurking in every corner. You'll need to split up and explore, but don't get too comfortable in your assigned room. The phantoms are cunning and unpredictable.

  • 👁️‍🗨️ VR and Flatscreen Crossplay: For those who don’t dare to venture into the haunted VR realm, you'll be able to join the spectral hunt even without a VR headset. The paranormal adventures will unite players from all corners of the gaming world, including Steam Deck and other mobile PC devices!

  • 🌟 Difficulty Levels: From beginner investigators to seasoned ghost hunters, Phantom Patrol scales to your level of bravery. Choose your difficulty and embrace the thrill.

  • 👻 A Spectrum of Alterations: Objects move, disappear, or appear out of thin air. Sizes shift, colors morph, and the very presence of phantoms loom over you!

  • 👁️‍🗨️ Interaction is Key: Collaborate, communicate, and trust your instincts. Phantom Patrol challenges your teamwork and your nerves. Don't look back; something might be following you.

Uncover the Alterations. Survive the Phantoms. It's Time to Patrol the Phantom Realm.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: 9th gen Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR, Index or Quest Controllers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: 13th gen Core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2070
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR, Index or Quest Controllers

short_description: A chilling VR and Flatscreen co-op game where you investigate a haunted house, race against phantoms, and unravel eerie anomalies. Survival is a test of memory and teamwork!
